Metadata.Title: CVE-2024-47619 affecting package syslog-ng for versions less than 4.3.1-3
Metadata.Description: CVE-2024-47619 affecting package syslog-ng for versions less than 4.3.1-3. A patched version of the package is available.

Criterion.Comment: Package syslog-ng is earlier than 4.3.1-3, affected by CVE-2024-47619
